ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] bazaar
ygData.msgSnippet: Well being married with 2 kids isn t gonna make contracting work STICK with the Misses. But, I do get my time in when I can. Enjoy it while you can .........
ygData.messageBody:
Well being married with 2 kids isn't gonna make
contracting work STICK with the Misses.

But, I do get my time in when I can.

Enjoy it while you can .........


--- Toni <silly_girl4ever@...> wrote:
>
> You could always do what my boyfriend does... He
> works most of the year (he's a software engineer
> {contractor}) then he takes a few months off during
> the summer =D It's awsome. We've had a great time
> Leveling our characters & playing neverwinter nights
> Kat
> Rob LeBeau <rlebeau65@...> wrote: The last
> line Barto, IS CLASSIC,
>
> MAN that was way too funny.
>
> Let me know when you do, I'll join ya.....hahahah
>
>
>
> --- mlockridge01 <MLockridge01@...> wrote:
> > Went there this morning to set up some sales. Lag
> > was terrible. It
> > was hard to even get my cursor on target. I
> suppose
> > it will be ok
> > once I get set up to sell, but the set up is
> > terrible. Move cursor.
> > Not on object. Move a bit more. Not on object.
> Move
> > back. Click.
> > Don't have object. Click again. Hmph. Had object
> but
> > didn't know it,
> > and just put it back. Click...
> >
> > Took so long that I didn't finish setting up
> before
> > I had to log. I
> > wouldn't have logged if I could have left my toon
> to
> > do business
> > while I was gone, but no such luck.
> >
> > I just gotta get another machine, faster
> connection,
> > and retire from
> > my job so that I can play all the time.
> >
> > Barto Proudfoot
> >
> >
>
>
